Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Finnish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Finnish Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Finnish Ambassador to the DPRK Yrjo Kim David Luotonen at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 On hand was Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.    
 After receiving credentials, the president had a conversation with the ambassador.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss National Women's Council
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss National Women's Council 
   Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Swiss National Women's Council.
 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Friday by Anita Fahrni, president of the Committee for International Relations of the council on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Swiss Women's Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Swiss Women's Delegation 
   Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with a delegation of the Swiss National Women's Council headed by President of its Committee for International Relations Anita Fahrni at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
 Present there were Vice-Chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union Ri Yong Hui, officials concerned and Rainer Baudendistel, country director a.i. of SDC in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Iran-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Iran-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group 
   Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Iran-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group.
 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Anoushiravan Mohseni Bandpei, chairman of the Iran-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group on a visit to the DPRK, on Friday.
